TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 970
TEI.2.document_title: James Tumlinson to Stephen F. Austin, 11-17-1824

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 970

div1.p: Sir It is my wish to have you to make an entry of the Ninth League of land, on this River above Kinslow's [Kincheioe's] for me if no other person hase not entered it and wish you to send me an answer by the bearer Mr. Moore and by so doing much oblige
